description: Technical Assistant to the Preparation of the Action Plan for the Government Manifesto.

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
Output 1 : Policy and Institutional Support Provided to implement SAP and MfDR
Output 2: Results-based Planning, Reporting, Budgeting and External Resource management ensured in implementing the SAP 
Output 3: Database and Information Systems utilized for monitoring, reporting and decision making – 
Output 4: Public Sector Reform aligned to the implementation of the SAP
subproject.title: Action Plan for Gov't Manifest

title: Action Plan for Government Manifesto
